other_tests.findings: New Q wave observed after an inferior myocardial infarction.
Postoperative echocardiogram showed satisfactory LVEF of 56%; Day 42 echocardiogram found evidence of severe left ventricular dysfunction.
Showed that both grafts were patent, but new tight stenoses were observed upstream and downstream from the LITA-LAD anastomosis, and new tight stenosis upstream from the RSV-RCA anastomosis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: New lesions developed at the sites of snare application.
